tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Kabinete nopotse kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la Naga la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato bile a dumelana gore go santse go le gontsi go go santseng go tlhoka go diriwa mo go baakanyeng diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase ka fa nageng..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyiphawulile inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ekuqalisweni koHlelo Lwezamandla, kanti liyazibona izingqinamba ezilokhu zikhona eziphazamisa isizinda sikagesi sikazwelonke.

src_text: Jaaka naga tsena mo marigeng, Kabinete itumedisitswe ke konteraka e sa tswang go garelwa ya dimekawate di le 400 ya go oketsa motlakase ka Letsholo la go Reka Motlakase mo Ditlamong tse di Nang le Motlakase Montsi go Feta di Dirisang mme motlakase ono tla gokelelwa mo diyuniting tsa rona tsa motlakase pele kgwedi ya Motsheganong 2023 konosela..

Mo godimo ga seno, Lefapha la Boitekanelo le nopotse maokelo le 213 a sa tshwanelwang ke go kgorelediwa ke go tshabela ruri ga motlakase, mo go ona le 76 ke ao ntseng sa itemogele matsapa ano mme tiro ya go oketsa palo eno ka maokelo mangwe gape le 46 gatetse pele mo go bonagalang..
tgt_text: Njengoba izwe lingena esikhathini saseBusika, iKhabhinethi lamukele ukuphothulwa kweNkontileka yama-400 megawatts (MW) kagesi owengeziwe ngohlelo lwe-Standard Offer Programme oluzotholakala ngobuchwepheshe ngaphambi kokuphela kukaNhlaba wezi-.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe gape le ke thankgololo e solofetsweng ya Lefelo la Ditirelo tse Dintsi tsa Merero ya Motlakase ka la bo 31 Motsheganong 2023 le le tla thankgololwang ke ba Dipeeletso tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa leng selo se se tla potlakisang dithulaganyo tsa go ikobela melao go tswela thuso ditlamo tse dintšhwa tsa motlakase gore le tsona di kgone go thusa nopotse kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe kwa Seteišeneng sa Motlakase sa Kusile go busetsa tirisong dimekawate di le 3 200 tsa yuniti ya bo 1, 2, 3 le 5 tsa motlakase mo bokhutlhong jwa ngwaga wa..

Kabinete santse tlhobaediwa ke dikgang tsa maaka tse di tswelelang go phasaladiwa mo mafaratlhatlheng ditlhaeletsano tse di reng naga tlo welwa ke lefifi la go tlhoka motlakase ka ntlha ya go phutlhama ga diyuniti tsotlhe tsa tlamelo ya motlakase.
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kwalokhu, uMnyango Wezempilo usukhombe izibhedlela ezingama-213 okufanele zingacinyelwa ugesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, ezingama-76 zazo esezivele zingacinyelwa nosekuzokwengezwa ezinye izibhedlela ezingama-46 ngokuqhubeka kwesikhathi.

src_text: Eskom netefaleditse puso gore na le maano go tlhokomela diyuniti tseno go dira gore naga se iphitlhele mo seemong sa go welwa ke lefifi.
Kabinete santse boeletsa boikuelo jwa yona jwa gore batho botlhe ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa ba tshwanetse go boloka motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lamukela ukwethulwa osekusemome kwe-Energy One-Stop Shop mhla wama-31 kuNhlaba 2023 ye-Invest SA okuhloswe ngako ukusheshisa izinqubo zokulawula ezizosiza izinkampani ezintsha eziphehla ugesi ukuthi nazo zibe yingxenye..

src_text: Maitlhomo ke go boloka motlakase yo kanaka dimekawate di le 1 000 ka letsatsi, mme seno se tla kgona go fokotsa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri ka kgato le nngwe letsatsi le letsatsi.
tgt_text: Liphawule inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe eSiteshini Sikagesi iKusile yokubuyisa ugesi oyizi-3 200 MW, kumayunithi 1, 2, 3 no-5 kwisizinda sikazwelonke uma kuphela owezi-..

src_text: Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, mo kopanong le bobegakgang ka Labotlhano wa la bo 26 Motsheganong 2023 tla baya naga mo dinakong ka dikgato tse di tserweng mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhathazekile ngezindaba ezingamampunge ezilokhu ziqhubeka zizungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana zokuthi maduze-nje isizinda sikagesi sikazwelonke sizowa lokho okuzoholela ebumnyameni ezweni lonke.

src_text: Boitekanelo.
tgt_text: U-Eskom uqinisekise uhulumeni ngezinhlelo ezibekiwe zokuvikela uhlelo lokusebenza lokugwema ubumnyama kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Go tloga ka la bo 24 Motsheganong 2023 Puso tlhomile Komiti ya Merero ya Setegeniki e eteletsweng pele ke Lefapha la Boitekanelo la Naga, go samagana le bolwetse jwa Kholera jo bo weleng kwa Hammanskraal mo masepaleng wa Teropo ya Tshwane, jo ga jaana bo setseng bo fetile ka matshelo le..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyaphinda licela bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi baqhubeke nokonga ugesi.

src_text: Go samaganwe le namane tona ya tiro ya go batlisisa gore bolwetse jono bo runtse kae ka tswa le mo metsweding ya metsi, diteroko tse di isetsang baagi metsi, mo dipompong le mo Seteišeneng sa go Tlhatswa Metsi a Leswe sa Rooiwal (WWTW).
tgt_text: Okuhlosiwe ukonga okungenani i-1 000 MW nsuku zonke, okulingana nokonga isigaba esisodwa sokucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga usuku ngalunye.

src_text: Go fitlha mo motsing ono, ga go bopaki bope jo bo bontshang fa go na le kokwana ya kholera mo metsweding yotlhe eno, mme seno se re raya se re go wa ga bolwetse jono ke ka ntlha ya tiragalo le nngwe e diragetseng ga jaana fetileng mme balwetse ba bangwe ba ba tlhagelelang ga jaana ke ka ntlha ya fa ba tshwaetsana.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezogesi, uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, uzokwazisa izwe ngokuqaliswa koHlelo Lwezamandla ngoLwesihlanu, mhla wama-26 kuNhlaba 2023, esithangamini sabezindaba..

src_text: Jaaka go tsweletswe ka ditharabololo, baagi ba motse wa Hammanskraal ba rotloediwa gore ba bedise metsi a tswang mo dipompong mme ba topetse letswatswana pele ba ka nwa.
tgt_text: Ezempilo.

src_text: Se sengwe gape, fa motho berekwa ke mala feroga dibete kgotsa na le matshwao motho yo tshwerweng ke mala motho yoo lebe kokelong kgotsa kwa tleliniking ya kwa motseng yo leng mo go ona.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usesungule ikomidi lezobuchwepheshe, eliholwa nguMnyango Kazwelonke Wezempilo, njengendlela yokubhekana nokubheduka kwesifo sohudo e-Hammanskraal eDolobheni lase-Tshwane, esesithathe impilo yabantu abayi-15 ngomhla wama-24 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Tona ya Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe, Rre Senzo Mchunu tla ikopanya le Meyara wa Masepala wa Teropo ya Tshwane, Mokhanselara Cilliers Brink, ka Labotlhano 26 Motsheganong 2023 maitlhomo le go loga leano mmogo la go samagana le go aga sešwa Rooiwal WWTW..
Go bona tshedimosetsoka botlalo ka letsetsa mogala wa tshoganyetso o dirang bosigo le motshegare wa Setheo sa Naga sa Malwetse a Fetelanang (NICD) mo go 082 883.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi omkhulu uyaqhubeka wokuhlolisisa yonke imisuka yokungcola, okungaba imithombo yamanzi, izimoto ezihambisa amanzi, izimpompi kanye nesihlanzimanzi i-Rooiwal Wastewater Treatment Works (i-WWTW).

src_text: Maele go okobatsa bolwetse jwa kholera teng mo go www.nicd.ac.za.
tgt_text: Kuze kube yimanje, abukho ubufakazi begciwane lesifo sohudo osebutholakele kule mithombo yamanzi, lokho okuqinisa ukuthi kungenzeka ukubheduka kwesifo sohudo kwasuka esigamekweni esisodwa sokungcola kwamanzi, njengoba izigameko zamanje zingenxa yokungcola okusuka kumuntu kuye komunye.

src_text: Dipatlisiso tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS).
tgt_text: Njengoba kuqaliswa izindlela zokungenelela, abahlali base-Hammanskraal bayagqugquzelwa ukuthi babilise amanzi empompi futhi bafake ingcosana kasawoti ngaphambi kokuwaphuza.

src_text: Kabinete tiisiwa mmoko ke seo pegelo ya 2023 ya QLFS se tlhagisang mo palo ya batho ba ba thapiwang tlhatlogileng garataro mo dikotareng ka go latelana mme palo ya batho ba ba nang le ditiro ba le.
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kwalokhu, noma ngubani ohanjiswa yisisu, ukucanuzela kwenhliziyo noma izimpawu zokuphathwa isisu kufanele avakashele udokotela wakhe ngokushesha noma umtholampilo wendawo..

src_text: 2 milione atumelang mo go ba le.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle, uMnu Senzo Mchunu, uzohlangana noSodolobha weDolobha lase-Tshwane u-Cllr Cilliers Brink, ngoLwesihlanu mhla wama-26 kuNhlaba 2023 emzamweni wokuqhamuka nesu elihlanganyelwe lokulungiswa osekudlulelwe isikhathi kwe-Rooiwal WWTW..

src_text: 4 milione leng palo re neng re le mo go yona pele ga COVID-.
tgt_text: Ngemininingwane ethe xaxa ungashayela inombolo ephuthumayo esebenza ubusuku nemini yeSikhungo Sikazwelonke Sezifo Ezithelelanayo (i-NICD) ku-082 883.

src_text: Seno ke se supo se se tlhamaletseng sa gore ikonomi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa boela sekeng..
tgt_text: Imihlahlandlela yokwelashwa kwesifo sohudo itholakala ngobuchwepheshe ku-www.nicd.ac.za.

src_text: Dipalopalo tsa batho ba ba thapilweng mo kgweditharong ya ntlha di bontsha gore go tlhodiwle ditiro di le 209 000 mo ditirong tsa semmuno mmogo le tse dingwe di le 107 000 mo ditirong tseo seng tsa semmuso mo kgweditharong ya ntlha ya monongwaga.
tgt_text: UCwaningo Lwekota Lwabasebenzi (i-QLFS).

src_text: Tirisanommogo ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Amerika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligqugquzelwa ukuthi i-QLFS yokuqala yangowezi-2023 ibonise ukukhula ngekota okulandelanayo kwenani lemisebenzi kanye nokuqashwa kwabantu abayizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Kabinete totobatsa kgang ya gore botsalano jwa naga ya Aforika Borwa le jwa Amerika santse le jwa go ntshana se se mo inong, jo bo sa nonofileng bile bo tswela maphata otlhe mosola ka go lekana mme seno se latela gore Tona ya Dikamano le Tirisano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhaba, Ngaka Naledi Pandor rwale maoto go kopana le Moambasatara wa naga ya Amerika, Reuben Brigety, go tšhotlha kgang ya gagwe ka go latofatsa naga ya Aforika Borwa gore rekiseditse naga ya Russia dibetsa.
tgt_text: 2 kusondela kancane kwinani eliyizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Kabinete boeletsa mafoko yona gore go na le dikgato tse di tlhomilweng tse di itsegeng tsa setipolomate tsa go se gatane menwana ya maoto tse dinaga tsotlhe di itseng gore di tshwanetse go di latela, le yona Amerika, fa go na le sengwe se se ba tshwenyang gore go kgonwe go mekamekanwa le botsalano jwa dinaga ka bobedi.
tgt_text: 4 labantu abaqashwa ngaphambi kwezinsuku zokuhlasela kwegciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke mafoko Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa gore go thankgololwe dipatlisiso tse di sa tseyeng letlhakore go batlisisa mofetsho ono wa gore naga ya Aforika Borwa rekiseditsa naga ya Russia dibetsa.
tgt_text: Lokhu kucacisa bha ukuthi umnotho waseNingizimu Afrika ululama ngokuqinile kwimiphumela yalolu bhubhane.

src_text: Dintlha tse di ribololwang ke dipatlisiso tseno di tla itsisiwe mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo.
Tirisanommogo ya naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Singapore.
tgt_text: Izibalo zemisebenzi zekota yokuqala zibonisa imisebenzi eyizi-209 000 eyasungulwa kumkhakha ohlelekile kanye nemisebenzi eyizi-107 000 kumkhakha ongahlelekile ngesikhathi sekota yokuqala yonyaka..

src_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa ne amogetse Tonakgolo Lee Hsien Loong wa Naga ya Rephaboliki ya Singapore ka Labobedi, 16 Motsheganong..
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano beNingizimu Afrika ne-United States (i-US) .

src_text: Naga ya Singapore beeletsa tota mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, dipeeletso tsa teng di feta R5 bilione mo maphateng a jaaka la tlhagisodikuno, la ditirelo tsa matlole le la thekiso ya dintlo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuqinisekisile ukuthi ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika ne-US busalokhu bubuhle, buqinile futhi womabili amazwe ayazuza kubona kulandela umhlangano phakathi kukaNgqongqoshe Wezobudlelwano Bamazwe Ngamazwe Nokubambisana, uDkt Naledi Pandor kanye neNxusa lase-US eliseNingizimu Afrika, uMnu Reuben Brigety, emva kwezinsolo zakhe zokuthi iNingizimu Afrika inikeze i-Russia izikhali..

src_text: Ditumelano tse di saenilweng magareng ga dinaga ka bobedi maitlhomo tsona ke go gagamatsa tirisanommogo mo mererong ya kgwebisano, dipeeletso, thuto mmogo le ya sesole..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lagcizelela ukuthi izindlela ezisunguliwe zokuxhumana zamanxusa azo zonke izizwe zikhona, kubandakanya i-US, ukuzwakalisa izinkinga uma ziqubuka ekuphathweni kobudlelwano phakathi kwala mazwe womabili..

src_text: Imbizo ya Moporesitente ya Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo le le Ikaegileng ka Ditikologo (DDM) la Porofense ya Kapa Bophirima.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele isimemezelo sikaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa sokusungulwa kophenyo oluzimele oluzohlolisisa izinsolo zokuthi kwahanjiswa izikhali zisuka eNingizimu Afrika ziya e-Russia.

src_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa garetse Imbizo ya Moporesitente ya borataro ya DDM kwa Porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima, kwa Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Drakenstein, mo Tikologong ya Cape Winelands ka Labotlhano wa la bo 19 Motsheganong..
tgt_text: Imininingwane yalolu phenyo izomenyezelwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi..

src_text: Moporesitente ne goga kwa pele baeteledipele botlhe ba maphata otlhe le mararo puso ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go se Nne le Ope yo Tlogelwang kwa Morago”.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano beNingizimu Afrika ne-Singapore.

src_text: Morago ga Imbizo Moporesitente ne jela nala lefelo le le gaufi le la Letsholo la Kago ya Mafelo Bodulo la Vlakkeland, mme leno ke la ntlha ka bogolo le le ka ga kago ya dintlo tsa setšhaba go fitlha mo motsing ono mo Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Drakenstein.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa usingathe uNgqongqoshe Wezwe u-Lee Hsien Loong weRiphabhulikhi yase-Singapore ngoLwesibili, mhla we-16 kuNhlaba..

src_text: Letsholo leno la kago le le simolotseng mo ngwageng wa 2017 tla re fa re garelwa la naya beng ba dintlo tseno ba le 2 556 magae..
tgt_text: Izwe lase-Singapore lingabatshalizimali abakhulu eNingizimu Afrika, nasebetshale izimali zenani eliphelele elingaphezu kwezigidigidi ezi-R5 emikhakheni efana neyokukhiqiza, izinsizakalo zezimali kanye nokuthengiswa kwezindlu.

src_text: Letsholo la go aga dintlo di le 942 kgato ya lona ya ntlha setse simolotswe, mme dintlo di le 454 di setse di feditswe go agiwa fa di le 301 tsona di santse di agiwa.
tgt_text: Izivumelwano ezisayiniwe phakathi kwamazwe womabili zihlose ukuqinisa uhwebo, utshalomali, ezemfundo kanye nokubambisana kwezokuvikeleka.

src_text: Botlhokwa jwa porojeke eno ke go thusa ka ditsela tse di farologaneng tsa kemonokeng ka matlole go thusa ba ba senang letso le bao letseno la bona le fitlhang go R3 500 (ka letsholo la Breaking New Ground), mmogo le go dirisa letsholo la Finance Linked Individual Subsidy go thusa bao ka ngwaga ba iponelang megolo e magareng ga R3 501 le R22.
Mo porojekeng eno go agiwa ka bobedi dintlo tsa setšhaba le tsa Bagale ba Sesole.
tgt_text: IMbizo kaMongameli yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM) eNtshonalanga Kapa.

src_text: Leeto la go Lekola Maemo kwa Masepaleng wa Teropokgolo ya eThekwini le kwa Masepaleng wa Tikologo ya uMgungundlovu ka la bo 18 le la bo 19 Motsheganong.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa ubambe iMbizo kaMongameli ye-DDM yesithupha eNtshonalanga Kapa, kuMasipala Wendawo i-Drakenstein, kwiSifunda sase-Cape Winelands, ngoLwesihlanu ziyi-19 kuNhlaba..

src_text: Jaaka le karolo ya Leeto la go Lekola Maemo go Diragatsa DDM, mo leetong la gagwe la go lekola maemo Motlatsamoporesitente Paul Mashatile ne buisana le bannaleseabe mo maphateng thuto le tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni, temothuo, dikhomese le diintaseteri nngwe ya diporojeke tse di botlhokwa tse di jetsweng nala ke Projeke ya go Fetola Maemo ya Ntshongweni leng teng koo go agiwang Teropo e tla Dirisang Thekenoloji magareng ga Durban lePietermaritzburg.
tgt_text: UMongameli uhole ithimba eliphuma kuzo zontathu izinhlaka zikahulumeni ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Asishiyi Muntu Ngemuva”.

src_text: Porojeke eno tla tsosolosa ikonomi mo lefelong leno, mme tla tsenya letseno ka go tlhagisa dipeeletso tse di ka fitlhang go R15 bilione mo dingwageng tse di tlang tse di ka fitlhang magareng ga di le 10 go fitlha go di le.
tgt_text: IMbizo yandulelwa uhambo lukaMongameli lokuvakashela lapho kwakhiwa khona indawo yokuhlalisa abantu eseduze i-Vlakkeland Catalytic Human Settlement Development, okuluhlelo olukhulu lokwakhiwa kwezindlu zomphakathi olwake lwaba khona kuze kube manje kuMasipala Wendawo i-Drakenstein.

src_text: Mafaratlhatlha Metsi.
tgt_text: Ukwakhiwa okwaqala ngowezi-2017 kuzothi kungaphothulwa bese kuhlinzeka ngezindlu eziyi-2 556 kulabo abafanelekile.

src_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa ne jetse nala Porojeke ya Metsi a Tshologang kwa Dithabeng tsa Lesotho ka Labobedi wa la bo 23 Motsheganong 2023 mme ko teng ne tsaya karolo mo letsholong la go thankgolola kgato ya bobedi ya porojeke eno.

Jaaka porojeke eno saenetswe go diragadiwa dingwaga di le dintsi tse di fetileng mmogo le go diegisiwa, mokete ono a bontsha gore jaanong tiro mo letsholong le le botlhokwa leno e leng mabapi le letsholo le legolo la dinaga di le pedi tla diragadiwa.
tgt_text: Ukwakhiwa kwezindlu ezingama-942 kweSigaba Sokuqala kuyaqhubeka, okuyizindlu ezingama-454 eseziphothuliwe kanye nezingama-301 ezisakhiwa.

src_text: Porojeke ya Metsi a Tshologang kwa Dithabeng tsa Lesotho botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore porofense ya Gauteng, Foreistata, Mpumalanga, Bokone Bophirima le Kapa Bokone di nne le metsi.
tgt_text: Ukubaluleka kwalo mklamo ukuthi ubhekelela izinhlelo zezindlu ezehlukahlukene kusuka kulabo abahola i-R0 kuya kwizi-R3 500 (ngaphansi KoHlelo Oludidiyelwe Lokuhlaliswa Kwabantu), kuya kulabo abasoHlelweni Lokuxhaswa Ngezimali Zokuthenga Indlu, labo abahola phakathi kwezi-R3 501 kuya kwizi-R22 000 ngenyanga.

src_text: Dipeeletso mo mafaratlhatlheng metsi go fetola matshelo maAforika Borwa di tswelela mo go ntshitsweng R14 bilione go neela dimasepala go samagana le matsapa tshalelomorago ya mafaratlhatlhatlha metsi, mme matlole ao tla tswa mo Mading Kago ya Mafaratlhatlha Magolo Metsi (RBIG) mmogo le mo Mading Ditirelo tsa Mafaratlhatlha Metsi (WSIG).
tgt_text: Womabili amathuba Ezindlu Zomphakathi kanjalo namathuba ezindlu Zomakadebona Bezempi akhona kulo mklamo..

src_text: RBIG tla dirisa madi go thusa diporojeke di le 130 mme WSIG yona tla thusa diporojeke di le 400 naga ka bophara.
tgt_text: UHambo Lokuyohlola Umsebenzi kuMasipala Wedolobha laseThekwini kanye noMasipala Wesifunda saseMgungundlovu mhla we-18 nomhla we-19 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e diriwang ke Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe (DWS) mo go lwantshaneng le bonweenwee mo madi ka fitlha go R600 milione buseditsweng lefapha ke ditlamo tse di neng di neelwa dithendara go se mo molaong.
tgt_text: IPhini likaMongameli u-Paul Mashatile uxoxisane nababambiqhaza kwezemfundo nokuqeqeshwa, ezolimo, ezentengiselwano kanye nezimboni ngesikhathi sohambo lokuyohlola umsebenzi kuMasipala Wedolobha laseThekwini kanye noMasipala Wesifunda saseMgungundlovu njengengxenye yokuhambela ukuhlola imisebenzi ye-DDM.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa gape le ke dikgato tsa thibelo le taolo go fedisa tiriso ya madi go sa mo molaong, tshenyo ya madi le tirisobotlhaswa ya madi.
tgt_text: Enye yemiklamo ehamba phambili evakashelwe kube yindawo okwakhiwa kuyona i-Ntshongweni Catalytic Project, lapho okwakhiwa khona iDolobha Lesimanjemanje phakathi kweTheku noMgungundlovu.

src_text: Dikabo tsa Tlhokomelo ya Baagi.
tgt_text: Lo mklamo uzovuselela imisebenzi efukula umnotho endaweni, nokufaka igalelo lotshalomali olubiza izigidigidi ezi-R15 eminyakeni eyi-10 kuya kweyi-15 ezayo..

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa neetswe tlotlo ke Setheo sa Lefatshe sa Tlhokomelo ya Baagi (ISSA) ka go abela Kabo ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya Kontinente ya Aforika ya Tlotlo ya Tiro e Tswileng Diatla mo go Tlhokomeleng Baagi, mme kabo eno akgola dipeeletso tsa puso mo matshelong bana, segolobogolo mo baneng ba ba tswang kwa malapeng a dikobo dikhutshwane.
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda yamanzi.

src_text: Maemo naga ya Aforika Borwa go tsenela dikabo tseno tse di tlotlegang ne bediwa: “Go atolosa ka iketlo tlhokomelo ya baagi go thusa bana ba ba dikobo dikhutshwane: Mo ntlheng ya go Neela Megolo ya Bana, mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa ”.
tgt_text: UMongameli U-Ramaphosa uvakashele umklamo i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-23 kuNhlaba 2023 lapho abe yingxenye womcimbi wokuphendulwa kwesoyi leSigaba Sesibili somklamo.

src_text: Mo dikabong tseno go amogetswe dikopo di le 138 go tswa mo dinageng tsa Aforika tseo leng leloko di feta di le..
tgt_text: Lo mklamo owasayinwa eminyakeni eminingi eyadlula futhi wabambezeleka, lo mcimbi ubonisa ukubaluleka kokusheshiswa kwalo msebenzi obalulekile wala mazwe womabili.

src_text: Thuso ya baagi ke ntlha e botlhokwa thata mo letsholong la puso la go fedisa khumanego mme bile gape ntlha eno botlhokwa thata mo go busetseng batho ba borona seriti.
tgt_text: Umklamo i-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ubaluleke kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukutholakala kwamanzi e-Gauteng, eFreyistata, eMpumalanga, eNyakatho Ntshonalanga naseNyakatho Kapa..

src_text: Thulaganyo ya tlhokomelo ya baagi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa ke nngwe ya dithulaganyo tse dikgolo mo lefatsheng, mo batho ba ba unngwelwang mo go yona ba fetang ba le dimilione di le.
tgt_text: Ukutshalwa kwezimali kwingqalasizinda yamanzi ukuze kuzothuthukiswa izimpilo zabantu baseNingizimu Afrika kuyaqhubeka njengoba kwatshelwe omasipala imali engaphezu kwezigidigidi ezi-R14 ukuthi babhekana nenkinga yokusilela emuva kwingqalasizinda yamanzi, ngokusebenzisa iSibonelelo Sengqalasizinda Yezifunda (i-RBIG) kanye neSibonelelo Sengqalasizinda Yezinsizakalo Zamanzi (i-WSIG).
I-RBIG izosetshenziswa kwimiklamo eyi-130 bese kuthi i-WSIG yona izofakwa kwimiklamo engama-400 kulolonke izwe..

src_text: Dipuo tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lathokozela ukuthi uMnyango Wamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle (i-DWS) uthatha amagxathu ekulweni nenkohlakalo njengoba usuthole cishe izigidi ezingama-R600 ezikhokhwe yizinkampani ezazuza ngokuthola amathenda ngokungekho emthethweni.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke gore Dipuo tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo di ntse di tsamaya ka thelelo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde laziphawula izinyathelo zokulawula ezibekwe ngumnyango zokuqeda ukusetshenziswa kwezimali okungahambisani nomthetho, okungenasidingo nokumoshayo.

src_text: Lenaneo la dinako tsa Dipuo tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo tse di saletseng mmogo le dinako tsa dikopano le bobegakgang tse di emang nokeng dipuo tseno:..
tgt_text: Indondo Yezokuvikeleka Komphakathi.

src_text: Labotlhano wa la bo 26 Motsheganong 2023 ka 13:00, Tona ya Lefapha la Pusoselegae le Merero ya Setso<segment (CoGTA), Mme Thembi Nkadimeng tla tshwara kopano le bobegakgang mabapi le Puo ya Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya CoGTA mme yona tla tlhagisa dikgato tse di tla tsewang tse maitlhomo tsona leng go tokafatsa tiro ya dimasepala...
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ithole iNdondo Yomsebenzi Omuhle kwezoKuvikeleka Komphakathi e-Afrika ngowezi-2023 yeNhlangano Yamazwe Ngamazwe Kwezokuvikeleka Komphakathi (i-ISSA), ebonisa ukubonga ukuzinikela kukahulumeni ezimpilweni zabantwana bethu, ikakhulukazi labo abaphuma emakhaya adla imbuya ngothi futhi abuthakathaka..

src_text: Ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Motsheganong 2023, Tona ya Tlhabololo ya Loago, Mme Lindiwe Zulu, mmogo le Tona ya Tlhabololo ya Loago Ditirelo tsa Bosiamisi le tsa Kgopololo ya Batshwariwa, Rre Ronald Lamola, ba tla tshwara Dipuo tsa bona tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo mme dintlha tsa ona ka ga dikopano le bobegakgang di tla itsisiwe mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo..
tgt_text: Isicelo sokungenela ukuthola le ndondo seNingizimu Afrika sasinesihloko esithi: “Ukwandiswa kancane kancane kokuvikeleka kwenhlalo yabantwana ababuthakathaka: Udaba lweSibonelelo Sabantwana, eNingizimu Afrika”.

src_text: Puo ya Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya Kantoro ya Moporesitente tla phasaladiwa ka Laboraro wa la bo 31 Motsheganong 2023 mme ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Motsheganong 2023 go tla tshwarwa kopano le bobegakgang mabapi le Kgatelopele e Dirilweng ka Phetogo ya Letsholo la Phetolo ya Ditheo mmogo le Matsholo Ditiro a tsamaisiwang ka Operation Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Inani eliphelele lezicelo zokungenela ezamukelwa zazisuka ezikhungweni ezingamalungu ezingama-48 emazweni angaphezu kwama-30 e-Afrika..

src_text: Segopotso sa Ngwaga wa bo 20 sa Letsatsi la go Keteka Boaforika mmogo le go Keteka Letsholo la go Sekasekana le Dinaga tsa Aforika.
tgt_text: Izibonelelo zethu zomphakathi zingummongo wohlelo lukahulumeni lokuqeda ububha futhi zingumnyombo wokubuyisa isithunzi sabantu bakithi.

src_text: Kabinete mmogo le maAforika Borwa otlhe ba keteka mmogo kontinente ya Aforika le lefatshe ka bophara Letsatsi la go Keteka Boaforika ka la bo 25 Motsheganong.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lweNingizimu Afrika lokuvikela umphakathi luphakathi kwezinhlelo ezinkulukazi emhlabeni, njengoba lunabantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyi-18 abahlomula kulona.

src_text: Yo ngwaga botlhokwa segolobogolo ka ntlha ya gore ke ngwaga yo go ketekewing segopotso sa bo 60 sa go saeniwa ga lekwalo la ditumelano la Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganeng wa Aforika (OAU) e feleditseng le Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganeng wa Aforika (AU).

Molaetsamogolo wa mekete ya ngwaga wa 2023 – “Go potlakisa go tsenya tirisong Letsholo la Kgwebisano ya Dinaga tsa Kontinente ya Aforika Ntle le go Kgorelediwa ke Sepe” – akgola kgatelopele e diriwang mo go tsenyeng tirisong lefelo le legolo mo lefatsheng mo mererong ya kgwebisano.
tgt_text: Amavoti Ezabelomali.

src_text: Monongwaga Kgwedi ya Aforika tla ketekiwa ka nako le nngwe le ya go keteka segopotso sa bo 20 sa Tsamaiso ya Tebosešwa ya Dinagaleloko tsa Aforika (APRM) leng maitlhomo go tlhotlheletsa tsamaiso e lolameng ya puso mo kontinenteng ka go dirisa thulaganyo ya go ithuta mo go ba bangwe le go ikela tlhoko
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyathokoza ukuthi amaVoti Ezabelomali eminyango kahulumeni aqhubeka kahle.

src_text: Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lwamaVoti Ezabelomali azayo kanye nezithangami zabezindaba:..

src_text: Mafelo a Itlhophileng Ikonomi (SEZ) kwa Namakwa.
tgt_text: NgoLwesihlanu mhla wama-26 kuNhlaba 2023 ngehora le-13:00, uNgqongqoshe Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana Nezindaba Zendabuko (i-CoGTA), uNks Thembi Nkadimeng, uzobamba isithangami sabezindaba mayelana neVoti leSabelomali elizocacisa izinyathelo okuhloswe ngazo ukuqinisa ukusebenza komasipala.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula SEZ ya kwa Namakwa e kwa Aggeneys mo porofenseng ya Kapa Bokone.

Lefelo leno le neseditswe pula go ya ka Molao wa Mafelo a Itlhophileng Ikonomi wa ngwaga wa 2014 (Molao wa bo 16 wa 2014) mmogo le SEZ eo tshitshintsweng eo leng karolo ya Letsholo la Dipeeletso la Moporesitente.
tgt_text: NgoLwesibili, mhla wama-30 kuNhlaba 2023, uNgqongqoshe Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi, uNks Lindiwe Zulu, kanye noNgqongqoshe Wezobulungiswa Nokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo, uMnu Ronald Lamola, bazoba namaVoti Ezabelomali kanti imininingwane yezithangami zabezindaba izokhishwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi...

src_text: SEZ ya kwa Namakwa tla letlelela dikgato tsa go bula meepo, go tlhagisa leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo, go agiwa ga mafaratlhatlha, motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa mmogo le tlhagiso ya dikuno tsa temothuo.
tgt_text: IVoti Lesabelomali leHhovisi likaMongameli lizokwethulwa ngoLwesithathu, mhla wama-31 kuNhlaba 2023 kanti isithangami sabezindaba ngeNqubekelaphambili Yezinguquko Zezakhiwo kanye Nemizamo Yokusungula Imisebenzi ehlanganiswa ngohlelo lwe-Operation Vulindlela sizoba ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-30 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Makala ano botlhokwa mo go tlholeng ditiro le mo go godiseng ikonomi ya porofense ya Kapa Bokone le ya naga..
tgt_text: USuku Lwe-Afrika kanye nokubungaza iminyaka engama-20 yeNdlela Yokuhlolana Kwamazwe ase-Afrika (i-APRM).

src_text: Go setse go dirilwe maikano dipeeletso feta R29 bilione mo kgatong ya ntlha ya SEZ.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi nabobonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bahlanganyele nezwekazi lase-Afrika nomhlaba wonke ukubungaza uSuku lwe-Afrika ngoLwesine, mhla wama-25 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Mo go ona go akarediwa Vedanta Zinc (R16 bilione), Frontier Rare Earth (R13 bilione), Hive Energy (R200 milione) le RRS Trade and Investment (R100 milione)..
tgt_text: Lo nyaka ubalulekile ikakhulukazi njengoba uluphawu lokuphela kweminyaka engama-60 kwasayinwa isisekelo somqulu weNhlangano Yobumbano Lwamazwe ase-Afrika, eyandulela uBumbano Lwamazwe Ase-Afrika.

src_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Kgatiso ya Boraro ya Leano la Naga la Mafaratlhatlha Metsi (NWRS-3) sa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Isiqubulo semibungazo yangowezi-2023 esithi - “Ukusheshisa Ukuqaliswa Kokuhwebelana Ngaphandle Kokukhokha Intela Kwamazwe Asezwenikazini i-Afrika” – sibonisa amagxathu athathwayo ekuqaliseni ukusebenza kwale nkundla yokuhweba enkulukazi emhlabeni..

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula NWRS-3 ya 2023 gore tsenngwe tirisong mme leano leno le gokelela batlhankedi ba bagolo botlhe le ditheo tsotlhe tseo di rweleng maikarabelo go tsenya tirong Molao wa Metsi Naga wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Umbungazo weNyanga ye-Afrika wakulo nyaka uqondane nokuphela kweminyaka engama-20 ye-APRM, okuhloswe ngako ukuqinisa ukubusa kahle ezwenikazini ngokulandela izindlela zokuthi izwe lifunde kwelinye izwe futhi aphinde ahlolane wona

src_text: Leano leno le tsamaisana le tshekatsheko e diriwang morago ga dingwaga tse dingwe le tse dingwe di le tharo ya NWRS-2, mo go nopotsweng dikarolo tse le atlegileng mo go tsona mmogo le dikarolo tse go santseng go na le dikgwetlho mo go tsona..
tgt_text: Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: NWRS-3 na le dintlha di le tharo tse di botlhokwa leng go dira bonnete jwa gore metsi le kgeleloleswe di tlisa tlhabologo, go fedisa khumanego le go se lekalekane, go nna le seabe mo ikonoming le mo go tlholeng ditiro, mme ka jalo metsi tshwanetswe go tlhokomelwa dirisiwe phepafadiwe laolwe le go elwa tlhoko ka go somarela le ka go abela batho ka go lekana.
tgt_text: INdawo Yomnotho Okhethekile (i-SEZ) e-Namakwa.

src_text: Leano leno le tlhagisa ditshitshinyo tse di utlwagalang mo go oketseng tlamelo ya metsi, go foka tiriso ya metsi, go tlhokomela ka tshwanelo metsi le kgeleloleswe, go tsenya tirisong melao ya go laola lephata la metsi le kgeleloleswe, go abela setšhaba metsi gore re fetole batsholateu, go rotloetsa tirisanommogo le ditheo tsa boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le go tlhokomela metsi le kgeleloleswe ka fa tlase ga maemo phetogo ya maemo loapi..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukubekwa kwe-SEZ e-Namakwa e-Aggeneys eNyakatho Kapa.

src_text: NWRS-3 phasaladitswe mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe www.dws.gov.za..
tgt_text: Lesi sethulo sokubekwa senziwe ngokwemigomo yoMthetho Wezindawo Zomnotho Okhethekile, wezi-2014 (uMthetho we-16 wezi-2014) futhi i-SEZ eyethuliwe iyingxenye yoMkhankaso KaMongameli Wotshalomali.

src_text: Pegelo e ka ga Dikgato tse Lefapha la Sesole (DoD) le di Tsenyang Tirisong go Samagana le Maitsholo Masole Sesole sa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa (SANDF) a Rometsweng kwa Dinageng tse di Nang le Dikgotlang go Dira Bonnete jwa gore go Rena Kagiso.
tgt_text: I-SEZ yase-Namakwa izovula amathuba okuhlomula ezimayini, ukukhiqizwa kwehayidrojini ehlanzekile, ukuthuthukiswa kwezingqalasizinda, ugesi ovuselelekayo kanye nokwenziwa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo ya dikgatelopele tseo naga ya Aforika Borwa di dirileng mo go tseeleng dikgato maitsholo a mangwe masole SANDF a romilweng go dira bonnete jwa gore go rena kagiso mo mafelong ao ba romilweng mo go ona go ralala le kontinente.
tgt_text: Le mikhakha ibaluleke kakhulu ekusungulweni kwemisebenzi kanye nokuthuthukiswa komnotho waseNyakatho Kapa nowezwe.

src_text: SANDF ke setheo se naga ipelang ka sona ka ntlha ya fa se tsaya karolo mo matsholong go tlisa kagiso mo kontinenteng go dira gore mafelo mo go ona go runtseng ntwa ya matlho mahibidu mo kontinenteng ya Aforika go rene kutlwano le kagiso mo go ona ka go ikamanya le tiro ya Dinagakopano (UN)..

Ka ntlha ya ditatofatso tse di runtseng mo ngwageng wa 2015 tsa gore mangwe masole a rometsweng go thusa ka letsholo la go tlisa kagiso latofadiwa ka mekgwa e tswileng mo taolong ya thobalano, Setlhophatiro sa Ditona se ne sa tlhomiwa mo ngwageng wa 2019 gore se batlisise, mo go DoD, fa dikgetse tseno tsa go robalana le baagi ba dinaga tseo ka go ba solofetsa legodimo le lefatshe le go ba tlhorisa (SEA) le boammaruri..
tgt_text: Lungaphezu kwezigidigidi ezingama-R29 utshalomali oseluvele luthenjisiwe esigabeni sokuqala se-SEZ.

src_text: Kabinete kgotsofaditswe ke dikgato tse di setseng di tserwe go samagana le ditiragalo tsa SEA mo matsholong go thusa go tlisa kagiso SANDF.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubandakanya izithembiso eziphuma ku-Vedanta Zinc (izigidigidi eziyi-R16), e-Frontier Rare Earth (izigidigidi eziyi-R13), e-Hive Energy (izigidi ezingama-R200) kanye nase-RRS Trade and Investment (izigidi eziyi-R100)..

src_text: UN tsaya Aforika Borwa jaaka sekai mme akgotse ka fao naga setseng samagane le matsapa ano go fedisa SEA mo go SANDF.
tgt_text: UShicilelo Lwesithathu Lweqhingasu Likazwelonke Lwezinsiza Zamanzi (i-NWRS-3) lwangowezi-.

src_text: Kabinete gateletse gore ga kitla letlelela maitsholo a tsamaisanang le SEA phuaganya tiro ntle e itsegeng SANDF e dirang mo kontinenteng..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze i-NWRS-3 yangowezi-2023 ukuthi iqaliswe futhi leli qhingasu liphoqa zonke iziphathimandla kanye nezikhungo ezisebenzisa uMthetho Kazwelonke Wamanzi, we-1998 (uMthetho wama-36 we-1998)..

src_text: Kgwedi ya go Keteka Seabe sa Bašwa ya Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lakhiwe ngokubuyekezwa kweminyaka emithathu ye-NWRS-2, okuveze izindawo lapho kube nempumelelo khona kanye nezindawo ezisanenselele.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Letsholo la Ngwaga wa 2023 la Kgwedi ya Bašwa ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go potlakisa thuso ya bašwa mo mererong ya ikonomi gore re kgone go nna le bokamoso jo bo sa tseweng ke phefo”.

Motlatsamoporesitente Mashatile tla ema ka lefoko Letsatsi leno la Naga mme lona le tla ketekiwa matsatsi le mabedi monongwaga go tloga ka la bo 16 go fitlha ka la bo 17 Seetebosigo 2023 kwa Mangaung Outdoor Sport Centre, Mangaung, Bloemfontein, kwa Porofenseng ya Foreistata.
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 iqukethe izinhlosonqangi ezintathu, zokuthi ezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle kufanele zeseke ukuthuthukiswa, ukuqedwa kobubha nokungalingani, zifake igalelo emnothweni nasekusungulweni kwemisebenzi, futhi amanzi kufanele avikelwe, asetshenziswe, athuthukiswe, aphathwe futhi alawulwe ngokusimeme nangokulingana..

src_text: Mo matsatsing le mabedi ao, bašwa ba tla neelwa tšhono ya go buisana le Ditona le Batlatsatona mmogo le ba bangwe ba bannaleseabe mo dikatisong tse di farologaneng tsa go itlhamela dikgwebo le go tlhatlhelelwa ka bokgoni go tswa mo pusong le mo badirisanimmogong ba bangwe mo mererong ya loago..
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lenza izethulo ezibambekayo zokukhushulwa kokuthunyelwa kwamanzi, ukunciphisa ukudingeka kwamanzi, ukuphathwa ngendlela kwamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle, ukubekwa kwezinqubomgomo emkhakheni wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle, ukuphakwa kwamanzi ukuze kuzokwenzeka izinguquko, ukugqugquzela ukubambisana kwamazwe ngamazwe, kanye nokuphathwa kwamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle ngaphansi kwesimo sezulu esiguquguqukayo.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Bašwa tla thankgololwa ka Labone wa la bo 1 Seetebosigo 2023 ke Tona mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente e Rweleng Maikarabelo Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi bong Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma kwa Musiamong wa Hector Pieterson Memorial kwa Soweto..
Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go gagamatsa matsapa go netefatsa gore bašwa ba fitlhelela ditšhono tsa go nna le seabe mo ikonoming.
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 ishicilelwe kwiwebhusayithi yase-DWS ethi: www.dws.gov.za..

src_text: Puso, jaaka le yona e thapang batho ka bontsi tsibogetse botlhokwa jwa tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni mmogo le go thapiwa ga bašwa ka go dira gore bašwa ba bantsi ba ba alogileng ba thapiwe mo matsholong go ithutela tiro mo Lephateng la Ditirelo tsa Puso go tla go ithutela tiro teng.
tgt_text: Umbiko ngezinyathelo eziqaliswe nguMnyango Wezokuvikeleka (i-DoD) ukubhekana nendlela yokuziphatha kwamalungu oMbutho Wezokuvikeleka Kuzwelonke eNingizimu Afrika (i-SANDF) atshalwe kwimisebenzi yokuletha ukuthula.

src_text: Puso samagane gape le go tsenya tirisong Sekgwama sa Matlole go Thapa Baagi (SEF) mmogo le go tsosolosa Setheo Naga sa Ditirelo tsa Bašwa (NYS) mo matsholo ano tla tlholelang bašwa ba le diketekete ditiro mo ikonoming.

Letsholo la Moporesidente la Kemonokeng ya Bašwa ka Ditiro le setse le atlegile mo go emeng nokeng ditšhono di le milione le halofo ka megolo ya letseno la nakwana, go tsenya tirong batho ba le milione le mongwe, ditšhono di le 250 000 tsa go tlhatlhelelwa ka bokgoni le mo tirong, ditšhono di le 250 000 tsa go lefelwa mabapi le ditirelo tse di abilweng mmogo le bašwa ba le 500 000 ba ba kgonang go itirela letseno le le tla gogang sebaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithole umbiko ngenqubekelaphambili eyenziwa iNingizimu Afrika ekubhekaneni nendlela yokuziphatha kwamanye amalungu e-SANDF atshalwe kwimisebenzi yokugcina ukuthula kulolonke izwekazi.

src_text: Jaaka re tsena mo Kgweding eno ya Bašwa, puso gakolola bašwa gore ba ikwadise mo sefalaneng sa SAYouth.mobi jaaka bankane ba bona ba le dimilione di le dine bona ba setse ba ikwadisitse, mme seno ke sefalana se ditiro di phasaladiwang teng.
tgt_text: I-SANDF ibilokhu ingumthombo wokuzigqaja kwesizwe njengoba iyingxenye yemisebenzi yokugcina ukuthula ezwenikazini eletha uzinzo nokuthula ezizweni zase-Afrika ezibambene ngempi ngosizo lweZizwe Ezibumbene (i-UN)..

src_text: Go Tshwara Mmogo Foramo ya bo Robedi ya Dikgwebo tsa Temothuo tsa Aforika mo Dipatlisisong tsa Lephata la Temothuo (FARA) e Leng Karolo ya Beke ya Saense Mmogo le Kopanokgothakgothe ya Yona ya Borobongwe.
tgt_text: Mayelana nezinsolo zamacala ezocansi abandakanya abagcini bokuthula bombutho wezokuvikeleka ezaqubuka ngowezi-2015, iThimba loNgqongqoshe lasungulwa ngowezi-2019 ukuze lizophenyisisa amacala okuxhashazwa nokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi (i-SEA) ngaphakathi e-DoD.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tshwara mmogo FARA e Leng Karolo ya Beke ya Saense Mmogo le Kopanokgothakgothe ya Yona ya Borobongwe gore tshwarelwe kwa Durban go tloga ka la bo 5 go fitlha ka la bo 9 Seetebosigo..
FARA ke mokgatlho mogolo mo kontinenteng o rwelelng maikarabelo go disa le go tsamaisa dipatlisiso tsa merero ya temothuo mmogo le go godisa boitlhamedi ka fa kontinenteng..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithokozile ngeqoqo lezinyathelo ezibekiwe ukubhekana nezehlakalo ze-SEA kwimisebenzi ye-SANDF yokugcina ukuthula.

src_text: Ka go tshwara kopano eno, naga ya Aforika Borwa tla unngwelwa ke tirisanommogo eno mmogo le tirisanommogo magareng ga ditheo tsa dipatlisiso tsa temothuo ka fa kontinenteng gonne mo go yona go tla tlhabanwa botlhale ka tsa saense le dipatlisiso tse di mabapi le temothuo.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula sekwalwa se iseng se butswe sa Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Taolo ya Motlakase wa Nyutlelia gore ka romelwa kwa Palamenteng.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ziphinde zibheke izinkinga ezaphakanyiswa eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ezamemezela izigaba ezithile zoMthetho we-IPID wezi-2011 njengezingekho emthethweni, ezinika uNgqongqoshe Wezamaphoyisa igunya lokumisa emsebenzini uMqondisi Omkhulu, ukuthatha izinyathelo zokuqondisa uMqondisi Omkhulu izigwegwe kulandela ukumiswa emsebenzini, kanye nokukhipha uMqondisi Omkhulu ehhovisi.

src_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa Molao wa Naga wa Taolo ya Motlakase wa Nyutlelia (NNR) wa ngwaga wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 47 wa 1999)..

tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlongoza inqubo engafihli lutho futhi esobala yokuqashwa koMqondisi Omkhulu kanye nenqubo ecacile nephelele yokuhlolwa kokwethembeka kwabasebenzi be-IPID.

src_text: Molao ono jaaka le ga jaana ga tsamaisane le maemo boditšhabatšhaba a tshwanetsweng go latelwa mo lephateng la pabalelo ya taolo ya motlakase wa nyutlelia gonne ga samagane le go rarabolola matsapa malwetse badiri ba ba direlang ditheo tsa difofane a tlhodiwang ke mogote wa dilo tse di leng kwa lefaufaung..
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa uphinde uhlinzeke ngezichibiyelo zezinye izigaba zoMthetho Omkhulu, ukuze kuzoqinisekiswa ukuthi i-IPID yenza umsebenzi owunikiwe ngendlela efanele nangempumelelo.

src_text: Baeteledipele go tswa kwa dikhutlong nne tsa kontinente ba kopane ka Mosupologo wa la bo 15 Motsheganong 2023 kwa Midrand, mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa go bula Palamente ya Borataro ya PAP.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlinzeka ngokusungulwa kwesikhundla sikanobhala ozimele ukuze i-PSC izoqinisa ukuzimela geqe kanye nokungathathi hlangothi kwenhlangano.

src_text: Kopano eno tla garelwa ka la bo 02 Seetebosigo.
tgt_text: Uma uMthethosivivinywa usuwenziwe waba umthetho, igunya le-PSC lizosatshalaliselwa komasipala nezinhlangano zikahulumeni.

src_text: Maitlhomo PAP ke go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di tlwaelegileng mo kontinenteng ka bophara mme ka jalo na le baemedi ba maAforika go tswa kwa dikhutlong nne tsa kontinente.
tgt_text: Isichibiyelo sizonikeza i-PSC indlela egxile kakhulu ekufakeni igalelo ekwakheni uhulumeni ophendulayo, oqotho noholwa ubugugu.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla tsaya karolo mo kopanong ya bo 56 ya lekgotlakhuduthamaga e tla tshwarelwang kwa Paris, kwa nageng ya France go tloga ka la bo 16 go fitlha ka la bo 30 Seetebosigo.

src_text: Khomišene ya Ditheo tsa Puso mo Mererong ya Dithuto tsa Mawatle e leng karolo ya Mokgatlho wa Thuto, Saense le Setso mo Dinagakopanong (IOC-UNESCO) ke karolo ya UN e rwelelng maikarabelo go ema nokeng merero ya lefatshe ka bophara ya saense le ditirelo mo mawatleng.

tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlose ukuvala izikhala ezikhona kuMthetho wamanje we-NNR wangowe-.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tlhaloganya sentle botlhokwa jwa dipatlisiso mo tlhokomelong ya mawatle yona le mabopo yona fa go tla mo tshomarelong ya ona.
tgt_text: UMthetho njengoba unjalo awuhambisani nezindlela ezilungile zomhlaba wonke kumkhakha wemithethonqubo yokuphepha kwenuzi ngoba awusho lutho ngokuvuleleka obala kwabasebenzi bezezindiza emisebeni yomhlaba.

src_text: Dipatlisiso tsa mawatle gape di thusa ka go abelana ka matshwao dikotsi go sa le gale fa go tla mo matlhotlhapelong a fuduwang ke mawatle mme seno se thusa puso go tsaya dikgato tse di lolameng ka ntlha ya kitso eo.

tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uphinde waklanywa ukuthi uMthetho we-NNR wangowe-1999 uhambisane nemiyalelo ye-International Atomic Energy Agency (i-IAEA) kanye nezindlela zayo ezinhle zokusebenza.
INingizimu Afrika iyilungu le-IAEA

src_text: Barati ba metshameko go tswa kwa dikhutlong nne tsa lefatshe ba ka solofela go amogelwa ka diatla tsoopedi tse di mofutho tse di nang le Botho mmogo le borobasogo jwa maemo a kwa godimo fa ba tlile ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa go bona Motshameko wa Sejana sa Lefatshe sa Bolotloa mmogo le wa Dikgaisano tsa Bomampodi tsa Lefatshe wa Karathi wa Kimura Shukokai International (KSI) jaaka naga setse ipontshitse gore na le bokgoni jwa go tshwara ka katlego metshameko megolo.

tgt_text: NgoMsombuluko, mhla wama-29 kuNhlaba 2023, uMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzohlonipha isimemo sokuhambela uKugcotshwa kukaMongameli Okhethiwe uMnu Bola Ahmed Tinubu weRiphabhulikhi yase-Nigeria.

src_text: Kabo eno lebelela gape le ka fao Tona dirisitseng pholisi ya taolo ya matlole go oketsa palo ya dipeeletso mo lephateng la motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa.Hana Gammon, mokwadi wa moAforika Borwa yo nang le dingwaga di le 20 jaaka fentse Dikgaisano tsa Dinaga tsa Seoposengwe fa go tla mo Dikabong tsa go kwala Dikgang tse Dikhutshwane mo kgaolong ya Aforika mme bile ke ene yo monnye go gaisa fa sale yo kileng fenya kabo eno.

tgt_text: Abaholi abaphuma kulolonke izwekazi bahlangane kusuka ngoMsombuluko, mhla we-15 kuNhlaba 2023 e-Midrand, eNingizimu Afrika kuMhlangano wePhalamende weSithupha we-PAP.

src_text: Rre Mda le Moporofesara Marwala maina bona okotswe mmogo le maAforika mangwe le 19 le ona ditiro tsa bona di tswileng diatla ao dirileng bontle mo maphateng a farologaneng.
tgt_text: Lo mhlangano uzophela mhla wesi-02 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: Moambasatara wa naga ya Aforika Borwa yo neng dira kwa nageng ya Algeria, Rre Billy Masetlha, yo diretseng naga eno mo ditirong tse di farologaneng mo pusong, go tsenyeletsa le go nna Mokaedikakaretso wa Setheo sa Ditirelo tsa Twantsho ya Bosenyi ne dira go tlala seatla mo Kgaratlhelong ya Kgololesego mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, mme kile gape ya nna tokololo ya Umkhonto we Sizwe.Murthi Naidoo, yo dirileng ka boineelo go lwela kgololesego ya naga eno ne golega ke sepodisi sa puso ya tlhaolele ka Ngwanaitseele 1965 mme gololwa ka Moranang 1966 mme go se ditatofatso dipe tse latofadiwang ka tsona mme ne nna le seabe se segolo mo nakong eo ka fa nageng go neng go ilediwa metsamao ka ngwaga wa.
Taolo ya go Runya ga Bolwetse jwa Kholera.
tgt_text: Ukulawulwa kokuqubuka kweSifo Sohudo.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula boitahaopo jwa ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa jwa go leba kwa Hammanskraal go jela baagi bao nala le go buisana le bona tlhotse jetse motse oo nala gompieno, Labone wa la bo 08 Seetebosigo 2023, mme leeto leno le neile Moporesitente tšhono ya go ikutlwela ka boene selelo sa baagi ka ga dikgwetlho tse ba lebaganeng le tsona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele uhambo oluhleliwe lukaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa lokuyoxoxisana nabahlali base-Hammanskraal.

src_text: Moporesitente, Tona ya Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe mmogo le Meyara yo Mogolo wa Tshwane ba kgonne go iponela ka matlho bona seo puso se dirang mo kgaolong eo mmogo le go neela baagi dikarabo tse di maleba..
tgt_text: Lolu hambo lwenzeke namuhla, ngoLwesine, mhla wesi-8 kuNhlangulana 2023, kanti lokhu kuxoxisana kunike uMongameli ithuba lokuzizwela ngezakhe kubahlali ngezinselele ababhekene nazo.

src_text: Ditharabololo tsa puso di tsenyeletsa le tsa go romela maokelo dijanaga kwa mabaleng motse wa Kanana, Hammanskraal, mmogo le go romela baitseanape ba maphata a farologaneng go thusa go thibela go anama ga bolwetse jono mme batho ba le makgolokgolo ba alafilwe ka katlego.
tgt_text: UMongameli, uNgqongqoshe Wezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle kanye noSodolobha Omkhulu wase-Tshwane bakwazile ukuhlola izingenelelo zikahulumeni kule ndawo kanye nokunikeza abahlali izimpendulo.

src_text: Go samaganwe le tiro ya go dira bonnete jwa gore bakhanselara ba dikgaolo tseno ba dirisa ka tshwanelo madi go samagana le mafaratlhatlha metsi.
Mo ngwageng re leng mo go ona ono, go beilwe kwa thoko madi feta R14 bilione go thusa dimasepala go samagana le tshalelomorago e leng teng mo mafaratlhatlheng metsi..
tgt_text: Izingenelelo zikahulumeni zibandakanya ukusebenza kwesibhedlela sesikhashana esingumahambanendlwana eKanana, e-Hammanskraal, kanye nethimba longoti abanamakhono ehlukahlukene abazonqanda ukubhebhetheka nasebelaphe ngempumelelo amakhulu abantu..

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tirisanommogo e nnileng teng magareng ga Teropokgolo ya Tshwane le Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe mo go logeng maano go samagana le kgodiso ya Bodutelo jwa go Tlhatswa Metsi jwa Rooiwal, mme tiro eno tla diragadiwa ka dikgaolo di le tharo mme go tla tlhokagala madi le kanaka R4 bilione.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi uyaqhubeka ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imikhandlu yendawo isebenzisa izibonelelo zengqalasizinda yamanzi ngendlela efanele.

src_text: Kabinete ikuela mo metseng e amegileng go itlhokomela le go tlhokomela segolobogolo bana.
tgt_text: Kunyakamali wamanje, ingaphezu kwezigidigidi ezi-R14 imali ebekelwe ukuthi omasipala babhekane nokusilela emuva kwengqalasizinda yamanzi.

src_text: Kholera ka thibelwa ka go dirisa metsi a tlhatswitsweng tlhatswe ka go bedisa sebaka sa motsotso le mongwe mme ka dirisa metsi a phepa le sesepa go tlhapa diatla.
Go bona tshedimosetso ka botlalo ka ga go thibela bolwetse jono etela webesaete ya www.gov.za/cholera.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakwamukela ukusebenzisana phakathi kweDolobha lase-Tshwane kanye noMnyango Wezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle ohlelweni lokulungisa isiHlanzimanzi i-Rooiwal, okuzokwenzeka ngokwezigaba ezintathu ezizodla izigidigidi ezi-R..

src_text: Puso rata go leboga mekgatlho yotlhe ya baithaopi mmogo le batho ba bangwe ba ba tsentshitseng letsogo ka go thusana le baagi bano..
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi licela imiphakathi ethintekile ukuthi ihlale iqaphile futhi inakekele kakhulu abantwana..

src_text: Pegelo e ka ga Boleng jwa Metsi.
tgt_text: ISifo Sohudo singagwemeka ngokusebenzisa amanzi aphephile.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Matsholo go Thibela go Dutla le fa le Lerothodi le le Lengwe la Metsi go Nwewa le Kgeleloleswe mme ona labofelo fa ne diragadiwa ne le ka ngwaga wa 2013 le wa 2015 ka go latelana ga ona.
tgt_text: Hlanza amanzi ngokuwabilisa kuqala okungenani umzuzu owodwa futhi uhlanze izandla zakho ngamanzi ahlanzekile nensipho.

src_text: Matsholo ke Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe go dira bonnete jwa gore melao ya metsi a obamelwa jaaka lefapha leno le maikarabelo le rweleng mo lekaleng la metsi go ya ka Molao wa Metsi Naga le Molao wa Ditirelo tsa Metsi.
tgt_text: Ngeminye imininingwane ngamasu okugwema lesi sifo vakashela ku-www.gov.za/cholera.

src_text: Maitlhomo sedirisiwa seno sa naga ya Aforika Borwa sa go dira bonnete jwa gore melao ya metsi a obamelwa ke go tokafatsa boleng jwa metsi a nwewang mo dimasepaleng, tlhokomelo ya metsi kgeleloleswe mmogo le go tlhokomela seelo sa tlhoko ya ditirelo tseno..
tgt_text: Uhulumeni ubonga lezo zinhlangano zamavolontiya kanye nabantu abeze ngaphambili bazofaka isandla.

src_text: Kabinete atlhaatlhile dipegelo tsa dipoelo tsa matsholo ano mo ngwageng wa 2023 mmogo le seabe se tla nnang le sona, mme tsona di phasaladitswe ka la bo 6 Seetebosigo..

Dipegelo tseno di bontsha gore go tloga ka motsi wa bofelo dipegelo tseno di konoseditsweng ka ona boleng jwa metsi a nwewang bo wetse kwa tlase mme metsi a sa direng letseno mo lekgethong oketsegile.

tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukwethulwa futhi kohlelo lwe-Blue, Green and No Drop Watch olwagcina ukwenziwa ngowezi-2013 nowezi-.

src_text: Tona ya Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di tlang tla itsise dikgato tseno tse porofense nngwe le nngwe tla di tsayang..
tgt_text: Izinhlelo ze-Green, Blue and No Drop Certification ziyizindlela zokulawula zoMnyango Wezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle (i-DWS) njengomlawuli womkhakha wezamanzi ngokoMthetho Kazwelonke Wezamanzi kanye noMthetho Wezinsizakalo.

src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: Inhloso yale ndlela yokulawula ehlukile yaseNingizimu Afrika ngukwenza ngcono ukuhlanzeka kwamanzi aphuzwayo komasipala, ukulawulwa kwamanzi angcolile kanjalo nokugcinwa kwamanzi nokulawula indlela amanzi adingeka ngayo.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dipuisano tse di tshwerweng magareng ga Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa mmogo le Tona ya Metswedi ya Dimenerale le Motlakase ya naga ya Mozambique, Carlos Zacarias, tse di ka ga go reka motlakase kwa nageng ya Mozambique go oketsa o leng teng ka fa nageng gore diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase di se goge boima.
Ka ono motsotso, naga ya Mozambique ka kgona go re rekisetsa dimekawate di le 80 mme mo tsamaong ya nako tla kgona go oketsa ka dimekawate tse dingwe gape di le 1. .
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lixoxisane kabanzi ngemiphumela kanye nemithelela yemibiko ye-Blue, Green and No Drop Watch yangowezi-2023, eyakhishelwa emphakathini ngoLwesibili, mhla wesi-6 kuNhlangulana..

src_text: Kabinete tsweletse go ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa go ema nokeng letsholo la Tlhokomelo ya Seelo sa Tiriso ya Motlakase mo Marigeng le le thankgolotsweng ke Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase, gore re kgone go boloka motlakase le go dira gore diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase di se goge boima mmogo le go dira gore mo marigeng re kgone go fokotsa ditiragalo tsa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri.
tgt_text: IMibiko ibonisa ukuthi kube nokwehla kumgangatho wokuhlanzeka kwamanzi aphuzwayo kanye nokwenyuka kwamanzi amoshekayo kusukela kwakhishwa imibiko yokugcina..

src_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo ya Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase e bontshang dilo tse dintšhwa tseo re di fitlheletseng mo go tlhokomeleng diteišene tsa motlakase le dikarolo tse dingwe tsa tirelo eno tse, go naya motlhala, di re thusitseng gore mo matsatsing a senang go feta bokhutlho jwa beke re se dirise leokwane la disele gore re nne le motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukela izinyathelo ezizothathwa nguMnyango Wezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle zokubhekana nesimo samanje esihlobene nokulawulwa kwamanzi namanzi angcolile.

src_text: Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase tla tshwara kopano le bobegakgang kamoso Labotlhano ka ura ya bobedi motshegare go buisana le bona ka dikgang tseno le tse dingwe tse di diragalang.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle emavikini alandelayo uzomemezela lezi zinyathelo iSifundazwe ngasinye.

src_text: Operation Vulindlela.

Kabinete amogetse kgatelopele e dirilweng ka letsholo la operation Vulindlela jaaka tlhalositswe ke Tona mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente, Khumbudzo Ntshavheni, mme yona mabapi le go fetola sebopego sa maphata tlamelo ya motlakase, mafaratlhatlha go rwala dithoto, tlhaeletsano ka didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji mmogo le ditirelo tsa di-visa..
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Palo ya maphata diphetogo tseno di setseng di konoseditswe mo go ona oketsegile go tloga mo go le mararo go ya mo go le 11 mme mo go mangwe gape le 14 tiro eno ntse tsamaya sentle.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele izingxoxo zakamuva phakathi kukaNgqongqoshe Kagesi, uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa kanye noNgqongqoshe wase-Mozambique Wezezimbiwa Nezamandla, u-Carlos Zacarias, ukuze kuzotholakala ugesi owengeziwe osuka e-Mozambique ukuseka isizinda sikazwelonke sikagesi..

src_text: Maitlhomomagolo ke go samagana le matsapa motlakase mmogo le go tokafatsa tiro ya go rwala dithoto ka diterene, mme bobedi jono ke jona jo bo imetsang kgolo ya ikonomi ya naga ya rona..
tgt_text: Okwamanje, i-Mozambique ingakwazi ukuthi ihlinzeke ngama-80MW bese kuthi amanye ama-1000MW esikhathini esingengakanani esizayo.

src_text: Lekgotla la Tsamaiso ya Merero ya Moporesitente (PCC).

Kabinete eme nokeng boikuelo jwa ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa jo bo dirileng mo kopanong ya PCC ka la bo 02 Seetebosigo 2023 jwa gore kabo ya ditirelo potlakisiwe gore ditlhokwa tsa baagi di tsibogelwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyaqhubeka nokunxusa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi beseke umkhankaso Wokulawula Ukudingeka Kukagesi Ebusika owethulwa nguNgqongqoshe Kagesi, ngenhloso yokonga ugesi ukuze kuzoncishiswa ukusindwa kwesizinda sikazwelonke sikagesi kanye nokusiza ukwehlisa izigaba zokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kulobu busika..

src_text: Moporesitente laetse lekgotla leno go potlakisa ditiro tsa go tokafatsa kabo ya ditirelo mmogo le go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di leng teng tse di tsamaisanang le molao, tsamaiso le tlhaelo ya dithata le badiredi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithole umbiko owenziwe nguNgqongqoshe Kagesi ochaza kabanzi okuzuziwe kamuva ekulawulweni kweziteshi zikagesi kanye neminye imisebenzi, isibonelo, evimbele ukuthi kube nesidingo sokuthi u-Eskom ashise udizili kule mpelasonto edlule nokuvimbele ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga..

src_text: Mo kopanong eno go tšhotlhilwe gape le diphetogo tsa Molao wa Metsi le tsa Molao wa Ditirelo tsa Metsi gore melao eno kgone go tswela mosola merero ya metsi.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Kagesi uzokwethulela kafushane abezindaba kusasa ngehora le-14:00, ngoLwesihlanu, ngalokhu kanye nokunye okwenzekayo.

src_text: Lekgotla le ne la itsisiwe gape le ka ditharabololo tse di dirilweng ke Lefapha la Dipalangwa fa go tla mo ditirelong tsa tshoganyetso mmogo le tsa go baakanya le go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha mmogo le tiro kgolo ya go ntsha mo diatleng tsa puso ya porofense maikarabelo go laola ditsela gore rwalwe ke ditheo tsa naga gore ditsela tsa diporofense di kgonwe go tlhokomelwa sentle ke Setheo sa Puso ya Aforika Borwa sa Kago ya Ditsela mo Nageng (Sanral).
tgt_text: I-Operation Vulindlela.

IKhabhinethi lamukele inqubekelaphambili yohlelo lwe-Operation Vulindlela njengokuchaza kukaNgqongqoshe eHhovisini likaMongameli, uKhumbudzo Ntshavheni, mayelana nokuqaliswa kwezinguquko zezakhiwo emikhakheni yezokuthunyelwa kwezamandla, ingqalasizinda yezokuthunyelwa kwempahla, ezokuxhumana ngokwedijithali kanye nezimvume zokungena nokuphuma kwamanye amazwe.

src_text: Lefelo la Tlamelo ka Diphatse tsa Dijanaga la Batyi (BACS).
Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tsa go bulwa ga BACS kwa Pretoria mme seno se dira gore naga nne mo maemong a kwa godimo mo lekaleng la dijanaga.
tgt_text: Inani lezinguquko eseziphothuliwe likhuphuke lisuka kwezintathu laya kweziyi-11, lapho ezinye eziyi-14 sizaqhubeka.

src_text: BACS ke karolo ya tikwatikwe e tlhatlhelelang baagi ka bokgoni e enngweng nokeng ke Setlamo sa Dijanaga tsa Ford mmogo le sa Motherson leng setlamo sa dipente le diphatse..
tgt_text: Lapho kugxilwe khona kakhulu kusekuxazululeni inkinga kagesi kanye nokuthuthukisa ukusebenza kahle kojantshi nezitimela ezithwala impahla, kokubili okusemahlombe okukhula komnotho.

src_text: Tikwatikwe eno ema nokeng batlamedi ba ditirelo ba leng bathobantsho gore le bona ba kgone go ikemela ka bobona mme mo lefatsheng ka bophara ba kgone go gaisana le ba bangwe fa ba sena go konosetsa dithuto tsa bona mo Letsholong la go Tlhatlhelela Baagi ka Bokgoni la Tikwatikwe ya Intaseteri ya Kago ya Dijanaga (di-AIDC)..
Tikwatikwe eno ya BAIC ga jaana thapile batho ba le 60, mo ba le 30 ba dirang motshegare mme ba bangwe ba le 30 ke ba ba dirang bosigo.
tgt_text: UMkhandlu Wokuxhumanisa KaMongameli.

src_text: Mo godimo ga seno samagane gape le go katisa bašwa go ba tlhatlhelela ka bokgoni mo godimo ga jo ba nang le jone.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi leseke isicelo sikaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ngesikhathi somhlangano woMkhandlu Wokuxhumanisa KaMongameli mhla zi-2 kuNhlangulana 2023 sokusheshisa ukuthunyelwa kwezidingonqangi njengendlela yokuphendula izidingo zemiphakathi..

src_text: Porojeke ya go Agela Baagi Dintlo tsa Setšhaba ya Lufhereng.
tgt_text: UMongameli uyalele uMkhandlu ukuthi usheshise ukuthunyelwa kwezidingonqangi futhi uxazulule izinselele ezihlobene nokushaywa komthetho, ukuphatha kanye nezithiyo kwezamakhono.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse dikgato tsa go thankgolola Porojeke ya go Agela Baagi Dintlo tsa Setšhaba ya Lufhereng kwa Soweto mo go yona go nang le mafelo bodulo le 407 a rentiwang a agetsweng batho ba ba rileng.
tgt_text: Umhlangano uphinde wabheka izinguquko kuMthetho Wezamanzi kanye noMthetho Wezinsizakalo Zamanzi ngenhloso yokuhlinzeka ukuthunyelwa okungcono kwamanzi..

src_text: Matsholo Puso Dintlo tsa Setšhaba thusa baagi ba ba iponelang megolo ka go farologana fokotsa tshalelomorago e leng teng ka mo dintlong mmogo le go dira gore batho ba ba nnang kwa dikamotshaneng tsa kwa morago ga dintlo le ba ba nnang mo mafelong baipei ba nne mo mafelong a leng gaufi le ditšhono..
tgt_text: Ngokufanayo, uMkhandlu waziswe kafushane ngezingenelelo zoMnyango Wezokuthutha ngomsebenzi ophuthumayo kanye nomsebenzi wokunakekela, kanjalo nokudluliselwa kwemigwaqo emikhulu isuka emagunyeni esifundazwe iye kuzwelonke ukuze kuzophathwa kangcono imigwaqo yezifundazwe yi-Ejensi Kazwelonke Yezemigwaqo eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Mafaratlhatlha Ditsela.
Go bulwa ga porojeke ya dimilione di le R56 kwa Estcourt, mo porofenseng ya KwaZulu-Natal, ke karolo ya matsapa puso go tokafatsa kgolagano ya tsamaiso ya merwalo mo diteroposelegaeng.
tgt_text: ISikhungo i-Batyi Automotive Component Supply.

src_text: Tiro e dirilweng mo porojekeng eno tsenyeletsa go okediwa ga tsela ya D1252 go tshela sekontiri mo mmileng wa lekgwarana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukuvulwa kweSikhungo i-Batyi Automotive Component Supply (i-BACS) ePitoli lokho okuqinisekisa indawo yaleli lizwe njengezwe emhlabeni eliyingxenye yomkhakha wezokukhandwa kwezimoto.

src_text: Tsela eno golagana le ya N3 e golaganyang teropo ya eThekwini le ya Johannesburg leng se se bulelang ditšhono tsa ditiro mo go bašwa ba ba senang ditiro le batho ba leng gona ba tsenang mo dikgwebong tsa dikonteraka.
tgt_text: I-BACS ingumkhiqizo wesikhungo esakha izimoto sakwa-Ford Motor Company kanye no-Motherson, okuyibona abahlinzeki bopende ofazwayo kanye nezingxenye zemoto.

src_text: Jaaka dithoto di feta 60 di tsamaisiwa mo mmileng wa N3, go okediwa ga tsela eno go tla thusa go motsamao wa go tsamaisa dithoto le ditirelo go leba kwa dikarolong tsotlhe tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa le kwa Dinageng tsa Bogare jwa Aforika.

tgt_text: Lesi sikhungo seseka abahlinzeki abamnyama ukuthi bazimele futhi bancintisane nomhlaba emva kokuthola iziqu zabo eZifundweni Zokwakhwa izimoto eSikhungweni Semboni Yokwakhiwa Kwezimoto (i-AIDC)..

src_text: Tirisanommogo mo Mererong ya go Thusa Baagi.
tgt_text: Isikhungo se-BACS njengamanje siqashe abantu abangama-60, abangama-30 basebenza emini, bese kuthi abanye abangama-30 basebenza ebusuku.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tirisanommogo magareng ga setlamo sa meepo sa Impala Platinum kwa Rustenburg mabapi le go agiwa ga moago wa tleliniki mmogo le wa thuto ya bomapimpana jaaka le karolo ya ona ya go diragatsa Leano la Merero ya go Tlhola Ditiro le go Thusa Baagi.
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kwalokhu, sibheke ekuthatheni intsha ezoqeqeshwa ukuze izothuthukisa amakhono ayo..

src_text: Tleliniki ya Freedom Park mmogo le Sekolo sa go Ruta Bomapimpana di neilwe Lefapha la Boitekanelo le Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo leng mafapha porofense ya Bokone Bophirima.
tgt_text: UMklamo Wezindlu Zokuhlala e-Lufhereng.

src_text: Tirisanommogo Magareng ga Puso le Mekgatlho ya Dikgwebo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukwethulwa koMklamo Wezindlu Zokuhlala e-Lufhereng e-Soweto nguMnyango Wezokuhlaliswa Kwabantu, onezindlu ezingama-407 zokurenta ezabantu abathile..

src_text: Kabinete amogetse tirisanommogo e dirilweng magareng ga Puso le Mekgatlho ya Dikgwebo mo tiro kgolo tla nnang ya go utolola dilo tse di kgoreletsang kgolo ya ikonomi le go tlhodiwa ga ditiro.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lukahulumeni lwezindlu zokuhlala luhlanganisa abantu abahola imiholo ehlangene, luqeda ukusilela emuva ekwakhiweni kwezindlu futhi lusondeza eduze namathuba omnotho kulabo bantu abahlala ngemuva kwamajalidi kanye nasemikhukhwini..

src_text: Maphata go samaganweng nao ga jaana ke motlakase go rwalwa ga dithoto mmogo le go lwantshana le bogodu le bonweenwee, mme go samaganwe gape le tiro nngwe ya go tlhala ditiro..
tgt_text: INgqalasizinda Yomgwaqo.

src_text: Tshireletsego le pabalesego.
tgt_text: Ukuvulwa komklamo womgwaqo obiza izigidi ezingama-R56 e-Estcourt, KwaZulu-Natali, kuyingxenye yemizamo kahulumeni yokuthuthukisa ukuthunyelwa kwempahla emadolobheni asemakhaya..

src_text: Go tlhokomela le go sireletsa mafelo bosenyi bo atileng mo go ona, Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa beetse kwa thoko R2 bilione e tla rekang diterouno le dijanaga tse di tla disang maemo phemelo.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi owenziwe kumklamo womgwaqo ubandakanya ukwakhiwa kabusha komgwaqo wobhuqu wase-D1252 ube yitiyela.

src_text: Madi le kanaka R65 milione abetswe diteišene di le 30 tse di kwa setlhoeng mo go lwantshaneng le bosenyi jo bo tseneletseng gore di kgone go lwantshana le dipolao le tse dingwe tsa ditiragalo tsa bosenyi jwa go thulana ga batho ka ditlhogo.
tgt_text: Umgwaqo uphumela kumgwaqo omkhulu u-N3, ohlanganisa iTheku neGoli, lokho okuzovulela intsha yendawo engasebenzi amathuba kanye nosonkontileka abasafufusa..

src_text: Mo godimo ga seno, Mapodisi a Dirisang Maano Twantsho ya Bosenyi (TRT) tla romelwa kwa diteišeneng le kwa dikgaolong tse bosenyi mo go tsona bo ineileng maatla..
tgt_text: Ngempahla engaphezu kwamaphesenti angama-60 ehanjiswa ngomgwaqo u-N3, ukulungiswa komgwaqo kuzoqinisekisa ukuhanjiswa kwempahla nezinsizakalo kuyoyonke iNingizimu Afrika ne-Afrika eseNingizimu ye-Sahara..

src_text: Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa samagane gape le go tokafatsa ditirelo tse di itlhophileng tsa go gata motlhala wa bosenyi, ka go katisa le go tlhatlhelela batlhankedi ba sepodisi kwa diporofenseng le kwa ditikologong tsa baagi go gata motlhala wa basenyi le go ba tshwara ka katlego.
tgt_text: Ukubambisana Nomphakathi.

src_text: Setlhopha sa Baemedi ba go Dira Dipatlisiso se se Ikemetseng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukubambisana nenkampani yemayini i-Impala Platinum e-Rustenburg ukuze kwakhiwe umtholampilo kanye nesikhungo senkulisa njengengxenye yoHlelo Lwezenhlalakahle Nezabasebenzi.

src_text: Kabinete itumeletse dikgato tsa ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa tsa go tlhoma Setlhopha sa Baemedi ba go Dira Dipatlisiso se se Ikemetseng se se tla emelwang ke baemedi ba le bararo go batlisisa mabaka a dirileng gore sekepe sa Naga ya Russia se se bediwang Lady se eme mo boemelakepeng jwa naga.
tgt_text: UMtholampilo wase-Freedom Park kanye neSikhungo Senkulisa zidluliselwe kuMnyango Wezempilo kanye noMnyango Wemfundo Eyisisekelo eSifundazweni saseNyakatho Ntshonalanga..

src_text: Setlhopha seno se monnasetulo wa sona leng Phineas Mojapelo yo mo malobeng neng le Motlatsamoporesitente wa Moatlhodimogo mo Kgotlatshekelong Kgolo ya Borwa jwa Gauteng yo neng le yo mongwe wa Baatlhodibagolo mo kgotlatshekelong eno neilwe dibeke di le thataro go sekaseka maemo molaotheo semolao le mangwe maikarabelo go tshwanetsweng go ipapanya nao go lekola gore ga go nna le ditiragalo tsa tlolomolao tse di dirilweng fa sekepe seno se ne se ema mo boemelakepeng jwa kwa
tgt_text: Ukusebenzisana phakathi kukahulumeni namabhizinisi ahlelekile.

src_text: Simon’s Town, kwa Motsekapa, mme re fa ba konoseditse tiro eno ba begele Moporesitente ka seo ba se utolotseng..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukusebenzisana phakathi kukaHulumeni namabhizinisi ahlelekile ukuthi kusetshenziswane ekususeni izingqinamba ezivimbela ukukhula komnotho ofaka wonke umuntu kanye nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi..

src_text: Baromiwa ba ba tla Lebang kwa Dinageng tsa
tgt_text: Izingxenye ezibekwe eqhulwini ezamandla, ezokuthuthwa kwempahla kanye nokulwa nobugebengu nenkohlakalo, kanye nomunye umsebenzi owenziwayo ohlelweni lokusungula imisebenzi..

src_text: Kabinete amogetse tshwetso Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa e tsereng ya go roma baemedi ba ditona go ya go kopana le Dinaga tsa G7 gore ba ye go ba tlhalosetsa ka maemo naga a tsereng go se tseye letlhakore mo ntweng e runtseng magareng ga naga ya Russia le ya Ukraine..
tgt_text: Ezokuphepha Nokuvikeleka.

src_text: Baromiwa bano tla bo le Tona ya Dikamano le Tirisano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhaba Naledi Pandor, Tona ya Kgwebisano, Intaseteri le Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo Ebrahim Patel, Tona ya Matlole Enoch Godongwana mmogo le Tona mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente Khumbudzo Ntshavheni..
tgt_text: Ukuqapha nokuvikela imiphakathi ethintwe udlame, uPhiko Lwamaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika selubeke eceleni cishe izigidigidi ezi-R2 ukuze kuzothengwa ama-drone kanye nezimoto ukuze kuzokwanda ukubonakala kwamaphoyisa emphakathini..

src_text: Go Ipaakanyetsa Kopano ya BRICS.
tgt_text: Izigidi ezingama-R65 nazo zibekelwe iziteshi ezingama-30 ezihamba phambili ngokuba nobugebengu ukuze zizolwa nokubulawa kwabantu namanye amacala.

src_text: Mo go ipaakanyetseng Kopano ya Bricks e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 24 Phatwe 2023, naga ya Aforika Borwa tshwere ka katlego Kopano ya Ditona tsa Dinaga tsa BRICS ka la bo 01 Seetebosigo 2023 kwa Motsekapa.
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kwalokhu, ama-Tactical Response Team ayatshalwa eziteshini nasezifundeni ezindaweni ezinamazinga aphezulu obugebengu.

src_text: Kabinete nopotse ditiragalo tsa go phasaladiwa ga lekwalo la melao ya puso le le ka ga tsiboso ya Molao wa Batipolomate Mabapi le go Sirelediwa le go Tlhokomelwa leng selo se se itsegeng se se leng mo molaong fa go tshwarwa dikopano tse di tla tsenelwang ke batlhankedibagolo ba dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa..
Go sirelediwa le go tlhokomelwa gono go mabapi le kopano eno seng motho ka boene.
tgt_text: UPhiko Lwamaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika luthuthukisa amaqembu okuthungatha amacala akhethekile, azoqeqeshwa esigabeni sesifundazwe nakwisifunda ukuze ezothungatha aphinde abophe izigilamkhuba..

src_text: Seno ke selo se re se dirang mo kopanong nngwe le nngwe e tla tsenelwang ke baromiwa go tswa kwa dinageng tsa boditšhabatšhaba mme tla tshwarelwa mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa go sa kgathalesege gore tla tsenelwa ke batho ba maemo a ntseng jang.
tgt_text: IThimba Lophenyo Elizimele.

src_text: Melao eno tshwanetse go sireletsa kopano le bao ba tsenetseng gore melao ya naga se ba ame go fitlha kopano eno garelwa
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukuthi uMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa abeke ithimba elizimele lamalungu amathathu elizophenya ngezimo zokuboshwa komkhumbi wase-Russia owaziwa ngelika-Lady

src_text: Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Ithimba osihlalo lalo iPhini laphambilini likaMongameli wamaJaji eNkantolo ePhakeme eNingizimu ye-Gauteng uJaji Phineas Mojapelo linikezwe amaviki ayisithupha ukuhlolisisa ukuthi ngabe izibopho zomthethosisekelo, ezomthetho kanye nezinye zagcinwa na ngesikhathi kuboshwa umkhumbi e-Simon’s Town, eKapa, futhi lizokwethula umbiko walo kuMongameli.

src_text: Dipegelo tsa Tiro e Dirilweng mo Kotareng ya Bobedi ya Ngwaga.

Kabinete amogetse Dipegelo tsa Tiro e Dirilweng mo Kotareng ya Bobedi ya Ngwaga mo pakeng e simolotseng ka Diphalane 2022 go fitlha ka Mopitlwe 2023 mme seno ke karolo ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Pakagare (MTSF) 2019-..
tgt_text: Izithunywa ezizoya emazweni e-G.

src_text: Lefapha la Tiromaano,Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Tiro tla re mo tsamaong ya beke kgotsa tse pedi tse di tlang la begela setšhaba ka dintlha tse di leng ka fa pegelong ya kgatelopele e dirilweng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele isinqumo sikaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa sokuthumela izithunywa zongqongqoshe ukuthi bayohlangana neQembu Lamazwe Ayisikhombisa (i-G7) ukuze beyochaza ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ayihlangene neze nempi ephakathi kwe-Russia ne-Ukraine.

src_text: Paka go samaganweng le yona tsamaisana le motlakase o tshabetseng ruri mme seno se dirile gore ditiro tse di emang nokeng ikonomi di goge maoto mmogo le go ama kabo ya ditirelo mo nageng.
Le fa go le jalo, Kabinete itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e dirilweng mo go diragatseng dilo tsa botlhokwa tseo di solofetsweng.
tgt_text: Iqembu lezithunywa lizobandakanya uNgqongqoshe Wezobudlelwano Bamazwe Ngamazwe Nokusebenzisana u-Naledi Pandour, uNgqongqoshe Wezohwebo, Izimboni Nokuncintisana u-Ebrahim Patel, uNgqongqoshe Wezezimali u-Enoch Godongwana kanye noNgqongqoshe weHhovisi LikaMongameli u-Khumbudzo Ntshavheni..

src_text: Kabinete nopotse gape le letsholo le le solofetsweng la go busetsa maemo sekeng leo le tlhagisitsweng ke maphata a maleba tiro eno.
tgt_text: Amalungiselelo eNgqungquthela ye-BRICS.

src_text: Ka Diphalane 2019, Kabinete neseditse pula MTSF, gore nne leano le puso tla le dirisang dingwaga di le tlhano go thusa go tsenya tirisong Leano la Tlhabololo la Bosetšhaba la 2030 mmogo le dithomo tsa ditlhopho tsa Puso ya Borataro.
tgt_text: Ukulungiselela iNgqungquthela ye-BRICS ezayo kusuka mhla wama-22 kuya mhla wama-24 kuNcwaba 2023, iNingizimu Afrika isingathe ngempumelelo uMhlangano Wongqongqoshe Bamazwe e-BRICS mhla lu-1 kuNhlangulana 2023 eKapa.. 2 IKhabhinethi likuphawulile ukushicilelwa kusomqulu kwesaziso soMthetho Wamalungelo Nokuvikeleka Kwamanxusa, okuyinto eyenziwayo uma kunezingqungquthela zamazwe ngamazwe ezizobanjelwa eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Dipegelo tsa ditlhopha tsa lefapha leno di tsepamisitse mogopolo mo dikarolong di le supa tse di botlhokwa tseo puso ya borataro inopoletseng tsona mme tsona ke: 1: Go aga puso e nang le bokgoni, maitseo bile tlisa tlhabologo; 2: go fetola batsholateu mo ikonoming le go tlhola ditiro; 3: Go samagana le Thuto, tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni le boitekanelo; 4: Go bokeletsa mogolo wa go thusa baagi ka go ba tlamela ka ditirelo tse di tshepagalang le tse di nang le boleng; 5: Go samagana le dithulaganyo tsa go fedisa go kgaoganya madulo go ya ka sebomorafe, go agela baagi madulo mmogo le go samagana le mebusoselegae; 6: Go ipopa ngatana le nngwe le go dira gore metse re nnang mo go yona nne e babalesegileng mmogo le; 7: Go itirela Aforika le Lefatshe le botshelo mo go lona bo leng botlhofo nngwe ya dikarolo tse go dirilweng kgatelopele mo go tsona ke tse di mabapi le go tlhokomela baagi mme eno ke karolo e botlhokwa mo go tlhokomeleng maAforika Borwa a dikobo dikhutshwane le mo go direng gore ba iponele letseno.

Mo ntlheng eno mmogo le mo go diragatseng karolo ya bone e botlhokwa, matlole megolo ya go thusa baagi okeditswe go fitlha go R1 165 bilione mme seno se tokafaditse matshelo maAforika Borwa feta le 18 milione a dikobo dikhutshwane.
tgt_text: Izindlela zokuvikeleka zenzelwe ingqungquthela yonke hhayi abantu abathile.

src_text: Mo go diragatseng ditsholofetso tsa go samagana le masaledi matsapa a tlisitsweng ke COVID-19, ka Mopitlwe 2023 maAforika Borwa feta le 27 344 a nang le matshwanedi ne setse duetswe megolo eno.
